game.name: Uagi-Saba 2
game.shortDescription: Uagi-Saba 2 is a creature care/breeder sim. Raise cute creatures all with their own brain, genes and unique body parts. Guide them through beautiful hand drawn environments using speech and positive/negative reinforcement. Breed your favorites and create the perfect creature!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uagi-Saba 2 is a creature care/breeder sim. Raise cute creatures all with their own brain, genes and unique body parts. Guide them through beautiful hand drawn environments using speech and positive/negative reinforcement. Breed your favorites and create the perfect creature!
